messages.content: I spent my childhood here in this constituency. Then I came back to raise my child here. After years of Tory austerity and neglect, we need a real change in Beaconsfield. I can make that change happen. If you want a motivated local candidate fighting day in day out for you, Vote Labour, Vote Alexa.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight for fairer funding for our local schools, increase teachers’ pay, reinstate bursaries for student nurses. Buy back Sure Start centres.
Labour will invest £150bn to fix our broken economy, building overdue hospitals; creating social housing, roads, broadband internet and public green spaces.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A country for the many not the few
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Repeal the Bedroom Tax, scrap Universal Credit, lower the voting age to 16, end rough sleeping, provide free school meals and free bus travel for all under-25s.

mentions.candidate: Elect ALEXA COLLINS Labour candidate for Beaconsfield

issues.education: Fight for fairer funding for our local schools, increase teachers’ pay, reinstate bursaries for student nurses. Buy back Sure Start centres.

community.content: Labour committed to extending home insulation programmes, zero carbon new homes (to cut fuel poverty) and green transport systems.

leaflet.personalStatement: I spent my childhood here in this constituency. Then I came back to raise my child here. After years of Tory austerity and neglect, we need a real change in Beaconsfield. I can make that change happen.

endorsements.endorsement: I'm an Army support worker for the Royal British Legion and I always vote! I'm backing Alexa and voting Labour because she wants a better future for all!
